Package net.varkhan.base.management.monitor

Interface Summary
Monitor<V> A monitored value.

A value point that reflects the state of a monitored process or resource.
MonitorAggregate<C extends Enum<C>,V,T> An aggregate monitor, linked to several component monitors.

A monitor that links a main monitored value point to several named components, either source or product of the main value.
MonitorParameter<P extends Enum<P>,V,T> A monitor whose value is governed by several parameters.

A monitor that links a main monitored value point to several named components, either source or product of the main value.
 

Class Summary
MonitorValue<V> A generic monitored value.

MonitorWritable<V> A generic writable monitored value.

A value that can be written, and keeps track of the number of updates.
 

Enum Summary
MonitorWritable.Count
